result.pros:
I stayed at The Plaza in Tirana, and it was an incredible experience. The hotel is truly top-notch, offering luxurious accommodations and impeccable service. From the moment I arrived, the reception team was welcoming and always smiling, making me feel right at home.

One of the best things about The Plaza is its prime location in the center of the city. Everything is within walking distance—shopping malls, cafés, and a variety of restaurants—making it the perfect place to stay if you want to explore Tirana with ease.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a luxurious and convenient experience in Tirana!
result.title: The Plaza Tirana offers top-notch service, a welcoming staff, and a perfect city-center location.

result.pros: Everything was perfect

result.pros: Central location. Friendly front desk and house keeping staff. Clean room.

result.hotelier_response:
Dear Andrei,
Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback following your recent stay with us. We deeply appreciate your kind acknowledgment of the aspects you enjoyed, and equally, we are genuinely sorry to hear about the disappointments you experienced during your departure.
Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused by your interaction with our reception team. We regret that the request to substitute breakfast with a small snack from the minibar was met with inflexibility and that your subsequent appeal for a breakfast refund was declined. We understand how this situation may have seemed unreasonable, particularly given your early departure.
Additionally, we are truly sorry for the difficulty you encountered when seeking assistance to arrange a taxi. The explanation provided to you regarding the unavailability of our drivers and the refusal to contact a regular taxi was not in keeping with the standards of service we strive to maintain. Your feedback has highlighted an area where we must improve to ensure that our guests are supported in all their needs, regardless of the time of day.
We pride ourselves on offering a five-star experience, and it is disheartening to learn that we did not meet this expectation in your case. Your comments have been shared with our management team, and we are committed to addressing these issues promptly. Training measures will be reinforced to ensure our staff members are better equipped to show flexibility, empathy, and proactive service in addressing guests' requests.
Thank you once again for your valuable feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and provide you with an experience that truly reflects our high standards.
Kind Regards, 
General Manager
result.title: Fabulous
result.cons:
While I enjoyed many aspects of my stay, I was disappointed by an interaction I had with the reception staff upon my departure.

Leaving for the airport very early (3:30 AM) and well before breakfast service began, I inquired about taking a small snack from the minibar – a bag of peanuts and a Kit Kat – in lieu of the breakfast I had already paid for.  To my surprise, the receptionist insisted I pay for these items. I agreed, but then requested a refund for the included breakfast which I was unable to utilize. Unfortunately, this request was denied.

To add to my frustration, when I asked the reception to order a taxi for me, they claimed this was not possible, stating that all their drivers were asleep. I clarified that I wanted a regular taxi, not a private car service, but they insisted they couldn't help.

This level of inflexibility and unhelpfulness was unexpected.  For a hotel that presents itself as a five-star establishment, I expect a higher level of customer service and a more proactive approach to guest satisfaction.  A simple gesture of goodwill and assistance with basic requests would have made a significant difference in my experience.

result.title: Fantastic!!!

stayed_room_info.room_name: Deluxe Double Room with City View

result.pros: Wonderful hotel. Also, the spa and room service were also top notch.
result.hotelier_response:
Dear Shannon, 
Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We're delighted to hear that you had a perfect stay with us. It was our pleasure to provide you with a superb experience, and we hope to welcome you back again soon! 
Kind Regards, 
General Manager

result.pros: Staff and rooms were great.  Free upgrade from standard room to a suite was much appreciated.  Also we’d asked for no feathers pillows and bed covers in our two rooms and literally a few minutes after we’d arrived, the housekeeping manager came round to check.  Very impressive.  Great location and 5 minute walk from Skanderbeg Square and other tourist attractions.  All parts of the hotel were very clean and in particular our rooms.  Prices were very reason Suripean standards.
result.title: Lovely hotel and staff.  Wholeheartedly recommend.
result.cons: A few small service flaws.  Examples - non-communication at concierge re booking a taxi for an excursion and also booking a restaurant.  Also in the breakfast buffet the food containers were quite often not being refilled quickly.  This morning I stood around for 10 minutes waiting for the scrambled eggs to be refilled and I’d noticed the same yesterday.  No teaspoons or sweeteners.  5 star hotels should not have the above issues.  That said, it did not detract from our stay to any serious degree and the variety and quality of the food was very good.
result.hotelier_response:
Dear Graham, 
Thank you for your detailed review and for highlighting both the positive aspects of your stay as well as the areas where we can improve. We are thrilled to hear that you appreciated the complimentary upgrade to a suite and that our housekeeping team responded quickly to your requests. It's also great to know you enjoyed our prime location and found the rooms to be clean and comfortable.
We sincerely apologize for the service flaws you experienced, particularly with the concierge communication and the breakfast buffet restocking. Your feedback is invaluable, and we will ensure that these issues are addressed to maintain the high standards expected from a 5-star hotel. Despite these minor setbacks, we're glad they did not overshadow your overall experience, and we're pleased that you enjoyed the variety and quality of our food.
We look forward to welcoming you back for an even more seamless stay in the future!
Kind Regards, 
General Manager

result.cons:
Relatively modest breakfast.
No swimming pool.
result.pros: Modern, clean, big rooms with panoramic views, best location
result.title: Best stay in Tirana

result.pros: The rooms were very clean and spacious. The employees were very respectful and they were helpful .

I was extremely satisfied with my experience, especially with the chauffeur nesti who went above and beyond to assist me with my delayed luggage. His help truly made a difference and added to the exceptional service of this hotel!
result.title: Exceptional
result.hotelier_response:
Dear Liridon, 
Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us! We are thrilled to hear that you were extremely satisfied with your stay. It’s especially heartwarming to know that our chauffeur, Nesti, made such a positive impact by going above and beyond to assist you with your delayed luggage. We take great pride in our team and their dedication to providing exceptional service. Your kind words will be shared with Nesti and the entire team. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon!
Kind Regards, 
General Manager

Dear Faisal, 
Thank you for taking the time to provide such detailed feedback about your recent stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our prime location, the spaciousness and cleanliness of your room, and the modern ambiance of our hotel. We take pride in offering a welcoming environment, and it’s wonderful to know that our staff made you feel accommodated.
We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the air conditioning and appreciate your patience. We will certainly look into this issue to ensure it is resolved for future guests.
Regarding breakfast, we are sorry to hear that the options did not meet your expectations. Your feedback is invaluable, and we will consider it as we continue to improve our offerings.
Lastly, we appreciate your suggestion about our staff's demeanor. We will remind our team of the importance of warm and friendly interactions to enhance our guests' experience.
Thank you again for your constructive comments. We hope to welcome you back in the future and provide you with an even better stay.
Your Regards, 
General Manager
result.cons: The AC even though it not on auto but on fan level 3 it keeps disconnecting for some reason. Breakfast could be improved as the options are limited, I only ate breakfast there once and the rest of the days I went to coffee shops near by
result.pros: The location is great, the view from the room and how spacious the room is and the hotel itself is modern and very clean compared to the other hotels in the city and staff are really accommodating even though I would recommend/suggest that they smile more often
result.title: Overall I would recommend anyone who is visiting Tirana to stay in this hotel as the location and the hotel itself is on

result.title: Pleasant business trip
result.pros:
Room was very spacious, tastefully furnished and the view from high floors was nice.
Central position of hotel makes everything close.
result.cons:
Coffee could be better. Some higher end coffee machine would do well.
I was surprised that the big conference room on top didn't have electricity plugs for attendees. Nearby bar has them though so it was ok to quickly charge in case of need.
result.hotelier_response:
Dear Miroslav, 
Thank you for your feedback! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the spacious room, tasteful furnishings, and the lovely view from the higher floors. We're also pleased that you found our central location convenient for your needs.
We appreciate your comments regarding the coffee and will consider upgrading to a higher-end coffee machine to enhance our guests' experience. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the lack of electrical plugs in the conference room. We're currently looking into solutions to address this issue and improve our facilities.
Kind Regards, 
General Manager

General Manager
